content:
I'll create a report based on the provided logs.

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System (around x=40, y=-83)
Automated coal mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (40.0, -82.0)
- Transport belt line from y=-83.5 to y=-86.5 at x=39.5
- Fuel inserter at (40.5, -83.5) servicing the mining drill
- Output inserter at (40.5, -87.5)
- Collection chest at (39.5, -87.5)

### Iron Plate Production System (around x=46, y=-80)
Two parallel smelting lines consisting of:
- Stone furnaces at (45.0, -80.0) and (47.0, -80.0)
- Output inserters at (45.5, -81.5) and (47.5, -81.5)
- Collection chests at (45.5, -82.5) and (47.5, -82.5)
- Input inserters at (45.5, -78.5) and (47.5, -78.5)
- Input chests at (45.5, -77.5) and (47.5, -77.5)
- Additional storage chests at (49.5, -80.5) and (49.5, -79.5)

ERROR TIPS
- When placing belts and inserters, ensure proper orientation and positioning first time to avoid repeated corrections
- Monitor chest capacity - some chests are showing "chest is full" warnings
- Keep transport belts clear to prevent mining drill blockages
- Ensure proper fuel levels in burner devices to maintain continuous operation

NAMESPACE

Important Variables:
- None significant observed in provided logs

Functions:
- None defined in provided logs

System States:
- Mining drill status transitions between WORKING and WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION
- Inserters commonly in WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS state
- Furnaces showing NO_INGREDIENTS status when empty
